title: Understanding the Types of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, different types of analysis are used to achieve various objectives. Consider what the goal of testing a new technique might be.

title: Focus on the Objective
text: Think about whether the objective is to measure something, identify something, or improve a method.

title: Types of Analysis
text: Qualitative analysis focuses on identifying what is present, while quantitative analysis measures how much is present. Characterization involves understanding the properties of a substance. Fundamental analysis often involves improving or understanding techniques.

title: Identify the Type of Analysis
text: Given the goal is to improve the accuracy of measuring air pollutants, which type of analysis does this represent?
